name: Mahjong Craft World.
description:
Mahjong is a free solitaire matching game which uses a set of Mahjong tiles.

The goal of this pyramid game is to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. You will be challenged to eliminate all pieces from the board.

Features:
- 100+ layouts
- nice background music
- gorgeous animation effects

Game Play:
- The Goal of the game is to remove all tiles out of the board by pairs.
- Tap to select tiles with the same picture and they will disappear.
- Only free tiles that are not covered are allowed to remove.
